alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 3:15PM EDT until June 22 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Franklin County in southeastern Indiana... Southwestern Fayette County in east central Indiana... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 315 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Santee, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Batesville, Oldenburg, Lake Santee, Blooming Grove, Metamora, Laurel, Peppertown, Andersonville, Hamburg and Buena Vista. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
